header.title: Welcome to the website of booky10
header.description: A minecraft plugin, client and mod developer

about.title: About me (booky10)
about.description: I'm a minecraft developer, who develops minecraft clients and plugins. Sometimes I also develop discord bots. Most of the things I do are just for fun.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Most of my projects are available on GitHub. I have 67 repositories at the moment, 42 of them are public. Currently my biggest project is the bookyClient.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: The best way to contact me is through discord, my name there is booky10#6666. I also have a discord server, where you can join. Another way to contact me is through e-mail.
